fit.desc: Allows the menu to match the full width of its target

cover.desc: Allows the menu to cover its target. When used, the self prop is no longer effective.

anchor.desc: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target.

self.desc: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target.

offset.desc: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels

touch-position.desc: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when the target of the menu is either clicked or touched

persistent.desc: Allows the menu to not be dismissed by a click or tap outside of the menu

auto-close.desc: Allows any click in the menu to close it

content-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the menu

content-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the menu

max-height.desc: The maximimum height of the menu in pixels

max-width.desc: The maximimum width of the menu in pixels

context-menu.desc: Allows the menu to behave like a context menu, which opens with a right mouse click

escape-key.desc: Emmited when the escape key is pressed
